summary: Pop music, short for popular music, started in the 1950s in the U.S. and U.K. It originally included rock and roll and youth-focused styles. Pop songs are usually short, have catchy choruses and hooks, and are easy to dance to. They often mix elements from different music styles like rock, urban, and dance. While "popular music" and "pop music" are often used the same way, pop music is a specific genre, while popular music includes many different styles that are currently popular.
title: Pop music
